Carolyn Wang is a undergraduate Statistics and Data Science and Public Affairs major at UCLA. Currently, Carolyn conducts research on Social and Emotional Learning in K-12 schools, interns at Strategic Actions for a Just Economy, and serves as the Community Service Commissioner, an elected official on UCLA's student government. Outside of school, Carolyn enjoys hiking, traveling, and trying new restaurants.
